code: public String transform(@XPath("/stock/symbol/text()") String symbol, @XPath("/stock/value/text()") String value) {     Integer hits = stat.get(symbol).     if (hits == null) {         hits = 1.     } else {         hits++.     }     stat.put(symbol, hits).     return symbol + "@" + hits. }

public String createRandomStocks() {     Random ran = new Random().     StringBuilder xml = new StringBuilder().     xml.append("<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>").     xml.append("<stocks>\n").     for (int i = 0. i < 100. i++) {         int winner = ran.nextInt(symbols.size()).         String symbol = symbols.get(winner).         int value = ran.nextInt(1000).         xml.append("<stock>").         xml.append("<symbol>").append(symbol).append("</symbol>").         xml.append("<value>").append(value).append("</value>").         xml.append("</stock>\n").     }     xml.append("</stocks>").     return xml.toString(). }
